remarks: Lemma for ~ assamulgscm (induction step).  (Contributed by AV, 26-Aug-2019.)
statement:
assamulgscm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
assamulgscm.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
assamulgscm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
assamulgscm.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
assamulgscm.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` F ) $.
assamulgscm.p $e |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) $.
assamulgscm.h $e |- H = ( mulGrp ` W ) $.
assamulgscm.e $e |- E = ( .g ` H ) $.
assamulgscmlem2 $p |- ( y e. NN0 -> ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> ( ( y E ( A .x. X ) ) = ( ( y .^ A ) .x. ( y E X ) ) -> ( ( y + 1 ) E ( A .x. X ) ) = ( ( ( y + 1 ) .^ A ) .x. ( ( y + 1 ) E X ) ) ) ) ) $.
